Description:
ROLL YOUR SLEEVES UP AND GET DIRTY
One of the original homes in Clifton Springs that was designed to enjoy the views from the front porch. The warmth of timber floors and large windows letting the light in are lovely features which make you feel right at home as soon as you walk in. Be warned this is a "big project" home.
In a suburb that is yet to reach its peak, where you can achieve a lot of house for your money. It's a great time to buy before the prices increase as these homes will be harder to come by. With a bit of time and money this home could be restored to its former glory. Are you up to the challenge?
Insights: 34 Yarramundi Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Amazing views to build your dream home.
Located in highly sought after Panoramic Terrace this vacant allotment of 359m2 approx. Comprises amazing uninterrupted north facing panoramic vistas, including water views of Geelong, Outer Harbour & Corio bay right across to the You Yang’s, along with the metropolitan nightscape which is absolutely mesmerizing. Watch the ships and yachts sail past from your lofty vantage point which is unable to be built out.
Design the perfect low maintenance townhouse and still have a good size back yard.
Walking distance to supermarkets, school, restaurants, golf course and ample local amenities whilst only a short drive into Geelong and all the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer.
Contact the listing agent for more photos on the potential views this sensation allotment has to offer.
Insights: 34 Panoramic Terrace, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
Luxurious townhouse with uninterrupted panoramic vistas.
There is no wondering why this sumptuous residence bucks convention and reserves its lower level for luxuriously appointed sleeping quarters. Though beautiful bay views are available from downstairs, it is the upper level that grants undisputed proof of accuracy for the name of this street.
Uninterrupted panoramic vistas across Port Phillip Bay to the You Yang mountains and the metropolitan night-scape are absolutely breathtaking! From your lofty vantage point above the treetops, see ships and yachts sail past whist you spend lazy days lounging on a balcony that represents the pinnacle of outdoor living.
Alternatively, catch the gentle sea breeze in the study or vast open plan family room, never tiring of the sensational scenery of this optimal northerly aspect. Daydream at the dining table, watching skies occasionally dotted with distant planes on course to unknown destinations.
Even cooks will enjoy their daily toil all the more with another fine expanse of horizon at the kitchen window. Here you can also keep an eye on kids playing in a backyard below that is filled with a feast to harvest, from fruit trees to herbs and vegetables.
This surprising space grows olives, peaches apricots, nectarines, lemon, lime, chilli, garlic, strawberries, pumpkin, sage, basil, mint and more! Tiered and beautifully landscaped both front and rear, leaving no lawns to mow, the new residents can simply relax and reap the rewards of this deliciously productive garden.
Opulently appointed throughout, inclusions encompass stainless steel Bosch appliances, bamboo flooring plus copious cabinetry such as pot-drawers and twin pull-out pantries. A large storeroom lined with shelving, under-stair storage and direct access to a garage that has an automated timber panel lift door add the lengthy list of features. Walk-in showers to both the en suite and bathroom plus reverse cycle heating and cooling are also found here.
Walking distance to supermarkets, school, restaurants, golf course and ample local amenities makes the quick 21 kilometre trip into Geelong almost obsolete. An abundance of Bellarine beaches, wineries, cafes and so much more simply equates to a decadently restful existence at this exceptional address.
- Panoramic bay, mountain & metro views from deluxe indoor & outdoor living zones
- Filled with natural light from north-facing timber-framed windows and sliding doors
- Opulently appointed, home office, 3BRs, main with fully-fitted WIR, bamboo flooring
- Ensuite & bathroom with WI showers, Bosch appliances, RCSS, storeroom
- Fully landscaped grounds include prolific food gardens & no lawns to mow
- Close proximity to abundant services, shopping & just 21km to Geelong CBD
Insights: 32 Panoramic Terrace, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
FANTASTIC VILLA (1 OF 3) SHORT WALK TO BOWLS/GOLF CLUB AND JETTY.
Just like new, No. 2 gleams, light and bright throughout. Comfortable and private living with the outdoor deck providing a glimpse of the bay. The open plan is generous and chic with gourmet kitchen , meals and living as well as doors opening to the outdoor deck and garden, two double bedrooms both with BIR'S, 2 way bathroom , separate laundry and rear outdoor utility area. Features central heating, split system, dishwasher, subtle colouring's and more. The double garage is extra big with liberal clearance (boat or caravan). Corner shops just at the end of the street , new supermarket and parklands a short , short drive. This villa is a pearl for the keen investor, downsize or that first buy, inspect now to appreciate.

Description:
BIG BLOCK (APP. 1170 SQM), DUAL ACCESS, WALK TO JETTY & CLUBS... DEVELOPE STCA
Tradesmen, family buyers or investors, No. 5 is a well-built home with generous proportions, light and bright throughout, gives the new buyer the chance to buy well for the future as block size will become harder to secure in the area. Lounge with dining, second living with kitchen and space for another living with doors opening to long pavilion style outdoor entertaining area. Three bedrooms, master with WIR, two with BIR'S, central 2 way bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features include split system, fan, pantry, new oven and outdoor blinds. The garden has an abundance of fruit trees, herbs and vegetable garden creating a private haven. Large double garage and second access for boat, caravan or extra vehicles. Do not hesitate, an opportunity not to be missed, ring me now.
Insights: 5 Elanora Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Enter the market
Offering two living areas, three bedrooms, this home would suit first home buyers, investments and retirees.
Front formal lounge.
Open plan kitchen, dining and living area.
Kitchen with large corner pantry, wall oven and gas hotplates.
Private outdoor area and garden.
Master bedroom with built in robes.
Solar power system to reduce your bills.
Split system air-conditioner
Modern home offering wide side access would ideally suit those seeking off street parking for a caravan and/or boat.
Exceptional opportunity to acquire a modern property in a highly respected estate of Clifton Springs.
Easy access to the Clifton Springs golf, bowls Clubs, safe boat harbour to launch your vessel.

Description:
GREAT FAMILY HOME
Impeccably presented, this home is truly family oriented. Fully established, it leaves nothing to do and an abundance of
time to enjoy surrounding recreational activities. Appointed with 900mm stainless steel stove and dishwasher, the kitchen is handsomely clad in solid timber. A cosy separate lounge or rumpus room plus open plan living at the core of the interior provide spaces for varied styles of relaxation. Three good sized
bedrooms plus study or 4th bedroom allow flexibility, and reverse cycle air conditioning joins ceiling fans for effective climate control. The well-fenced backyard encloses enormous covered deck for BBQs, 2nd pergola currently used as an outdoor gym and complete with 2 car garage and carport + additional shedding at the rear of the property. From this address, stroll to primary school or catch a bus to secondary colleges or into Geelong. Situated within easy walking distance of a golf course, tennis club plus the sandy shores of Port Phillip Bay for fishing and swimming, this home even encourages a healthy lifestyle.
Insights: 7 Goondiwindi Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
FUNKY LIVING AND BAY VIEWS
This unique home offers multiple living areas over three levels, imposing high ceilings and has lovely Bay views to the You Yangs.
Downstairs comprises an updated kitchen with open plan living and dining area with log fire, two bedrooms with built in robes and spacious bathroom. The first floor features a large living area opening to a deck with high ceilings and views to the water, generous main bedroom and ensuite. The third level offers the choice of a fourth bedroom, home office or third living room with wide water views to the You Yangs.
Further features large double garage, electric heating and log fire, hardwood floors and loads of character.

Address: 19 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
BELLARINE BEAUTY, STUNNING BAY VIEWS AND...
Walk to the waters' edge at the end of the street, enjoy the magic sunsets relaxing in your own living room. Upstairs consists of two living spaces with balcony , allowing for flexible use according to your needs, both taking advantage of full bay views, the master bedroom is on this level as well as large 2 way bathroom and WIR. Ground level has two more bedrooms, fourth or a large study/living, two with BIR's, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features include central heating, pantry, dishwasher, evaporative airconditioning, ducted vac., spa bath, water tank and loads of storage. The garden is abundant with fruit trees, vegetables and matured growth creating a personal green spot. Extra large double garage which goes through to another boat/car bay and garden shed. An opportunity not to be missed, sheer bliss on the Bellarine.

Description:
Entertainer With Sparkling Views And More!
Sparkling Corio Bay views that stretch from Geelong to the You Yangs & beyond, guarantee a serene tone to entertaining at this stunning address! Just 3 doors from the foreshore, this stunning home is well placed for relaxed walks along the bay! Daily life functions effortlessly with simple access to the Clifton Springs Golf Course, Harbour, and schools and shops in Drysdale.
Blessed with a huge allotment and 2-storey design, this home provides your family with all the space you’ll ever need! Interiors are fresh and light, with floating spotted gum floors to the upper level.
The top level captures impressive bay views and is dedicated towards relaxed entertaining, with an open-plan kitchen/living/dining spilling out to the large alfresco. The kitchen shines with stainless steel appliances and great storage. You’ll love watching the planes landing at Avalon from the privacy of the master bedroom, and waking up every morning to a view of the You Yangs! Twin WIRs and a spacious en suite are great extras!
The kids will be comfy downstairs with 2 beds (both with BIRs), a stylish bathroom, and lounge at their disposal! The gym/4th bed is perfect for guests. Stay on top of work in the quiet home office.
Key features of the home include family-sized storage, powder room, ducted heating, Inverter ACs, security system and an intercom.
Lush gardens providing a tropical setting for outdoor entertaining. Outside, there’s enough room for a pool or shed for your boat or caravan (STCA), with plenty of space left over for a veggie garden and the kids to play! DLUG with rear carport parking, plus secure parking via the double gates to the backyard.
With views aplenty, an abundance of space, and a to-die-for position, this gorgeous family entertainer is not to be missed!
Insights: 4 Campus Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Quiet Family Living!
Hidden away at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac, this suburban retreat with luscious gardens makes you feel like you've entered your own secluded oasis.
This three bedroom brick family home boasts a large lounge with open fireplace for those upcoming cold winter nights, as well as an open modern timber kitchen and dining/living area complete with slow combustion heater.
Moving outside, you're greeted by a paved and neatly landscaped under cover alfresco/entertaining area which includes a designated bbq and wood fired pizza oven. Looking from the table out to the beautifully established and serene garden with back entry to the reserve, you wouldn't think that you were only minutes to schools, shops, the bay and boat ramps.
Featuring two split system heating and cooling air conditioners, ample storage, quality appliances, and lock up garage which extends to a large carport/boat storage area, this home has it all.
Sam Edwards : 0498 427 939

Description:
Sensational views of the You Yangs
Looking for a place to relax & watch the boats go by? This two storey residence would make the an excellent holiday home. The large entertainment deck consists of an alfresco area & a large open area. There are balconies running down either side of the second storey.
Downstairs there is large games room with gas log fire, separate bedsit with its own ensuite and walkin robe. Super sized laundry.
Hobbyists will enjoy the workshop.
Upstairs the master bedroom with walk in robe has sensational views through the floor to ceiling windows.
Polished timber floors throughout.
Spacious central bathroom with corner spa.
Study / home office.
Quiet low maintenance garden offering lots of privacy.
Situated in a quiet court within easy walking distance to the local shops, the safe boat harbour, Clifton Springs Primary School.
Ideally suited for those seeking a second living space for family.

Description:
A TOUCH OF CLASS
This spacious custom built home of 5 years on 585m2 of land is pleasing to the eye and will suit the astute purchaser looking for a beautiful modern home. Comprising 3 generous bedrooms plus 4th or study, 2 bathrooms including full en-suite with stone benchtops, 1200mm shower and his/her vanity. Open plan living at its finest with both living spaces opening onto the alfresco area via bi-fold doors with the space itself wired for sound and fitted with plumbed gas. Stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances, plumbed fridge, step in pantry, spotted gum timber floors, 9ft ceilings and double garage with internal and drive-through access all further compliment this stylish modern home. An inspection will not disappoint.

This area is close to local schools and childcare, playgrounds & public transport or just a short drive to local shops. Once you've built and settled in, you'll be able to enjoy all the lifestyle opportunities the region has to offer and the panorama on show 365 days a year! Call NOW for more information and arrange to view the land for yourself while you have a chance!

Description:
Relaxation starts here!
Light and cheerful, and with a delightful ocean vista from the 1st-floor master bedroom, this big beach house offers your family a relaxed place to enjoy the holidays or daily life! With the beach, local schools, public transport, boat harbour, golf course, snorkelling and family-friendly Drysdale close by, this home is well placed to add ease to your busy lifestyle, or inject fun into your holidays!
Quality comes first with this builder’s home, with timber touches and a solid feel evidenced throughout. Interiors have a beachy charm that exudes a welcoming atmosphere: this is a place you’ll be happy to come home to!
The spacious floorplan puts relaxed entertaining to the top of your ‘to-do’ list, with the open-plan living, dining and kitchen area spilling out to a covered deck. The lounge has a cosy feel that makes it perfect for curling up with the kids on ‘movie night’. Timber bench tops, stainless steel appliances and a big pantry tick the right boxes for easy catering. Downstairs, 3 kids beds (each with built-in robes) share entry to the family bathroom. The master bedroom (with en suite and walk-in robe) and study are tucked under the gable roof, with the master bed boasting sweeping glimpses of Geelong and the Bay!
You’ll appreciate the low-maintenance appeal of the big back garden. Other features include ducted vacuum, RC-AC, a shed (with workshop), and carport parking. Whether you're building a life here or seeking relaxation, this cruisey beach house is the place to do it!
Insights: 58 Dandarriga Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

A formal setting
A beautifully maintained three bedroom family home offering two living zones. On entry a welcoming entrance hall greats you and your guests. Formal lounge showcases the class of this elegant home.
The kitchen with its long bench tops and oodles of cupboard space overlooks a roomy dining area with a spacious family area to cater for a growing family.

A large open study with built in bookshelves to showcase a lifetimes collection.

Address: 81-85 High Ridge Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Lifestyle Property - the best of the Bellarine
Available for viewing by Appointment call 0409 289 230 to confirm your attendance
Sitting majestically elevated on top of High Ridge, overlooking the surrounding countryside this property is positioned to capture the panoramic views of Corio Bay, Geelong and the You Yangs. Effortlessly combining contemporary style with classic features, this Master Built home boasts spacious, light filled living areas and outstanding design features providing for direct access out to private courtyards and covered entertaining areas.
Vaulted Ceilings in the main living zones create a sense of spaciousness, full length Western Red Cedar windows bring the outside in, slate flooring and a double sided open fire place deliver the living, dining and kitchen zones instant lifestyle appeal. The kitchen features stainless steel bench tops and splashbacks, mountain ash timber carpentry and quality appliances.
A private Home Office adjacent to the front entrance again benefits from spectacular views making work from home a great pleasure. Through to an opulent ensuite complete with sunken spa bath & uninterrupted views, WIR and beyond to the Master Bedroom with private balcony. Additional bedrooms with high ceilings, BIR's and central bathroom all capture views out to the lush, leafy gardens, rolling hills and courtyard spaces.
Downstairs provides another complete package. An informal family living area and excellent guest accommodation, with its large L shaped rumpus room, purpose built wine cellar, separate laundry and bathroom. Full length windows and sliding glass doors give access directly to the landscape gardens of this 2.5 acre property.
This spectacular property pays homage to the fine art of living, the pleasures of entertaining and combines an abundance of additional features: double garaging with direct access, ducted central heating, water storage tanks, shedding, and secure fencing. Enjoy all that the Bellarine has to offer with its award winning vineyards, Olive groves and famous surf beaches.
Insights: 81-85 High Ridge Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
